itemDescription: Director-General of the British Security Service

wikipedia_page.main: Andrew David Parker, Baron Parker of Minsmere,  (born 1962) is a former British intelligence officer who served as Director General of MI5 from 2013 to 2020. He has been serving as Lord Chamberlain of the Household since 1 April 2021, and is a crossbench member of the House of Lords.

response: The current Director General is Ken McCallum, who succeeded Andrew Parker in April 2020.
* Andrew Parker - Director General of the Security Service (MI5)
